div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem
xv die mensis octoberis Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo Septimo

Quo die dominus Johannes rudirfurde de tarlane miles electus fuit in officium
prepositi Et thomas fif Willelmus Kyntor' Johannes stephani et Willelmus
blinsell electi fuerunt in balliuos Ac moricius bissat Duncanus straloche
thomas Jamesone et Robertus club electi fuerunt in seriandos huius
burgi pro anno futuro fideliter ad deseruiendum in dictis officiis ipsorum quilibet
solitum prestitit Juramentum

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Symon gardin Ranaldus tailyour Willelmus moir Junior Dauid spens thomas
chapman Donaldus strathachin Willelmus nicholsone Willelmus nory

div.head: gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
In the evyne quartar de quo moricius bissat est seriandus Johannes henrison et
alexander stabillar In le crukit quartar Duncanus straloche seriandus Johannes
tailyour et alexander huchonson In the grene quartar thomas Jameson seriandus
george frostar et martinus bonar In futy quartar Robertus seriandus Robertus
tailyour et Andreas vocat

div.head: Communione consilium
div.p:
Alexander chamer de merchil
Alexander menyeis
Jacobus leslie
Robertus blinsell
Dauid menyes
Johannes Knollis
Johannes Colison
Johannes cullan
Alexander rede
Alexander chamer filius
Andreas murray senior
Johannes Wormet
Richerd hil pater
Robertus prat
thomas prat
Walterus auchnef
Johannes glenmaluyn
Andreas Wentone
Dauid simsone
Willelmus mar'
Johannes grige
Willelmus futhes
Johannes menyes
henry hoirn'
Johannes moir
Alexander sanchar
thomas chamer
Ranaldus talyour
Alexander nachty
Richardus cullan
Alexander gray
Dauid prat
Symon gardin
Robertus buchan

the xxiij day of October the yer forsaid It was ordanit and statute
be the aldirman balyeis diuers' of the consal and communite present for the tyme
that na hukistar' cakbaxtar nor spillar' of the mercat sal by meile bot
als'mekile as wil stede tham self fra markat day to mercat day and that thai
sal tak nay straike of meile fra landmen in tyme to cum Ande quhay that
beis conuikit and brekis this statut' that sal pay the first tyme viij s' onfor
gevin Ande gif thai be nocht potent to pay the saide viij s' thai sal stand'
in the goif xxiiij s' houris

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos quinto die
nouembris anno Domini lxxxvijmo

Eodem die patricius beche fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit prouidum virum Robertum
blinsell suum procuratorem legalem ad prosequendum Andream goldsmitht in grene pro summa
xv s' et vj d' sibi debit' ex parte patricij chamer pelliparei et eandem petend'
exigend' et recipiend' in vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato et
de receptis acquitandum

the samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Androw murray eldar forspekar
that alexander talyour sal pay xii s' to Richerde hile eldar for ane hous' maile
eftir the tenor of ane act maid tharapone obefor

add.foreign: productio littere regie per dominum Johannem rudirfurd' prepositum

div.p:
The xiii day of nouember the yer' forsaide eftir the balman had passit
throu the haile tone be oppin premunicion chargeand the haile consal and
communite to comper within thar tolbutht to her our Souerane lordis lettres
and gif thar' ansuer tharapon
conperit comperit
sere Jhone rudirfurde of tarlane knicht
aldirman of the said burghe' and thar producit and schew ane letter of our
Souerane lordis vndir the Signet and his subscriptione as eftir followis James
be the grace of god kinge of Scottis to the consaile and communite of our burghe off
Abirdene greting fforsamekile as it is schewin to vs that our lettres ar direkit
chargeand' a gret part of you to comper befor ws and our consal within
xv dais for a debat of the office of aldirmanschip of our said burghe clamit be
Dauid menyeis quhilk office as we vndirstand ye haue geuin for' the defence of
your common' profit to our louet fameliar seruitour sere Jhon' of Rudirfurde of tarlane
knicht Ande the said Dauid menyes has maid a complaunt til vs one the behalf
of you the haile body of the tone sayand' that the saide sere Jhon' is A mastirfull oppre
ssour' of our liegis And for his oppressione thar may nay merchante lyve within our saide
burghe' And that he has nocht the saide office with your consent bot be electioun of a few
simpil personis his kynnismen quhilkis thingis gif thar be informat of verite ar richt
displesand' / for our mynd was and is that our saide seruitour haue the saide office for the
gud reule and common' profit of our said burghe Our wil is herfor and we charge you
stratlie and commandis that ye incontinent thir our lettres sene pas' to giddir to youris tolbutht
and avisitly havande E to the commone profit of our saide burghe' consider and tak knaw
lege of the said informacione maide apon our saide seruitour your aldirman with vtheris informa
cionis' as salbe schavin be him to you gif thai be maid of verite and of your mynd
and will or nocht And' thareftir that ye send your mynde til ws clos' vndir your selis
or vndir autentywe Instrumentis tharapone say that we ma provid for gude
reule and gouernance of our said burghe in tyme to cum and mak the traspassoris
ande contraris of the common proffit of the samyn to be pvnist as accordis of Justice
Certifying' you that be Informacion maide tile ws be our seruitour and knicht forsaide
vpone diuers' thingis that ar done contrar the common' profit of our said burghe we
wil mak the samyn to be reformit and the priuilege of our said burghe to be obseruit
and kepit in tyme cuming' And in the meyne tyme that ye and Ilkan of you ansuer
and obey to our saide seruitour your aldirman in al thingis and to the balyeis chosin
with him as ye dide obefor As ye wile ansuer to vs tharapone And vndir the
hieast pane and charge that eftir may follou Nochtwithstandin our' vtheris lettres
gevin in the contrar obefor Ande thir our lettres be you sene vndirstandin and deuly
execut deliueris tham to giddir with your autentik ansuer to the saide sere Jhone the berar
gevin vndir our Signet at Edinburghe the v day of nouember And' of
our Regne the xxviij yer' / James / R' And' eftir the said letter was
oppinly rede herde seyne and vndirstandyne thir personis vndir writin that is tosay
Robert blinsel Jhone of Knollis mastir Androw cadiow Jhone Wormet William
abirdour Robert prat Richerd hile Jhon' glenmaluyn' Robert of buchan Jhon' mar'
Richerd' hil yongar Dauid Kintor yongar Jhone fechat alexander scrogis Androw murray
yongar thome simsone Richerd of Cullan Jhone menyes William hay William
quelp William moir eldar Jhone of Kintor Androw goldsmitht thome of
Waus Jhone sanclar alexander rolland tollar William Dunbrek Symon
gardyne george brone Jhone grige Donald strathachin Robert crage
Dauid prat Alexander gray William andirsone yongar Jhone blak William
vmfray thome sadillar henry bavne thome gledistane Robert evinsone
William nory William Dauisone Dauid spens William sprvnt Will
scharp thome litstar Sandy allanson patrik adamson' William verty
Alexander rollande Jhone fechat Edmond' hay William gray Will ranison'
Ranald' talyour thome hatmakar Robert quhit patrik Clerk thomas fif
William Kintor Jhone stevinson' Patrik andirson' William giffarde
Dauid hile Dauid symsone Robert flessar thome of narne Androw
murray eldar Robert Kyntor James of Kennarty gilbert Moreson William of
tulidef Richerd litstar William fywe Duncan lammyngtone Sandy tailyour
Jhone thomsone William philp Duncan smitht Sandy baxtar Robert
ouchterles' Androw audene Sandy logy Dauid talyour James of
Kintor Androw ancroft James Kennarty yongar Jhone atkinsone Moris
byssat Duncan straloche thome Jamesone and Robert club James crak
Jhone Waus Jhone of buchane Wate of auchnef murtho glenmaluyn and
Jhone of lundoris auisitly deliuerit the saide sere Jhone being removit that
thai gaf neuire pouer commavnd nor commissione to Dauid menyes na to nane
vthiris to gif ony bill of complant nor to mak sic senister Information' in thar
name tile our Souerane lorde nor his lordis of Consale apone the said sere Jhon'
rudirfurde declarand the said relacione nocht trew Ande atour thai declarit and
schew that the said sere Jhone maid nane oppressione within the saide burghe
apone nay man

The xxvi day of nouember the yer forsaide the aldirman ballieis
and diuers' of the consal assignit to Androw murray the masone the maile
of the widew of Richert of Kintor of hir' halfis nettis fischinge of Done
extending' to xij markis' yerlie in his fee

In the balye Court of Abirdene haldin be the balyeis of the samyn the thrid day
of December the yer forsaide

The samyne day comperit Androu andirsone and schew that he was warnit to comper
befor the aldirman and ballieis to ansuer to Jhone chene anent ane annuele
rent of iiijor merkis pertening to him as he allegit out of ane land that was vm
quhile Jhone andirsone his fadir liand' in the saide burghe' peroffering him
reddy to vndirly the decisione of ane assis' anent the said annuele Rent

the samyn day Robert ouchterles' conuict' be ane assis' for' the strubulance of
mage smitht And to Amend' to hir' as law wile

The samyne day it was decretit and deliuerit be warde of the court that
Jhone of lamyngtone sale pay to Williame lamyngtone viij s' becaus'
he tuk to preif the saide vij s' pait the saide day and falyeit in his preif

In the balyeis court of Abirdene haldyne be the ballieis in the tolb
uitht of the samyn the xi day of December the yer forsaide the aldirman
ande balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Androu Waus to pref
that he deliuerit to thome gledstane his gude sone to Jhon litstar and to his avne wif in his
name xij bollis of atis for' ix markis And in likuis' to the said Jhone
litstar to preif his pament tharanent

The samyn day James steile constitut and ordanit Alexander Rede his procurator' et cetera to
ask resaue and follow thomas chavmer litstar for iiijor elne and iij quartaris of
quhit clatht that he deliuerit him to lyt grene et cetera promittand' to hald ferme
and stabile

The samyn day alexander sanchar' grauntit him avande to h thome simsone
xij barrellis of smale salt and xlviij s' of Siluer

the samyn day Will blitht was maid quyt be ane assise of al somes of
siluer follouit and clamit apon him and sandy findlaw be Duncan lamyntone except'
xxviij d' apone the said Williame and xvj d' recouerit apone the
saide Sandy finlaw
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiiijo die Decembris anno quo supra

The quhilk day mastir Androw cadiow comperit befor the aldirman and ballieis and
perofferit him reddy to schaw to the merchandis how far he hede procedit in
the presence of thar gudis takin be the lorde palmar' Ande euire redy to
schaw thame quhat he hede in the saide mater'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die Decembris anno quo supra

The samyne day the aldirman and ballieis with awis' of the haile court
has assignit to Williame garlache the law day eftir yule next to cum
as day of peremptour to ansuer' tile ane borghe strekit apone him be
William abirdour for' the wranguisly withhaldyn fra him of xiiij li' g'
of Flandris money to compt' and reckning quhilkis he resauit of ane serplat
of woll of his And for' the wranguislie withhaldin fra him of the pament
of ane serplat of skinnis fiwe hidis certane canyr skynnis certan lame
skynnis and ij barrellis salmond in likuis' that he resauit of his to compt'
and rekning as his billis proportis And that day to ansuer peremptourly
but ony exceptione'

Item the samyn day Richerde of Cullane grauntit him to haue resauit fra
the forsaide Williame of gareache tene lib' gretis of the saide some
and to releif him tharof as law will

The samyn day eftir that Androu andirsone hade producit ane chartir of ane
annuel rent of iiijor merkis yerlie to be rasit of ane lande callit Dauid
spens' to giddir with vthir landis and annuele rentis gewin to him be vmqu
hile Jhone andirson his fadir as the samyn mair fullie proportis Jhone
chene protestit quhat thingis happinit to be done betuix the saidis Androw ande
Dauid spens suld turne him to nay preiudice

The samyn day Androu Waus' follouit Jhone litstar' in the grene for ix
merkis for xij barrelis of atis be verteu of our Souerane lordis lettres Ande the richtis
of batht the saide partiis schavin and vndirstandyne the said Jhon' was fundin
quyt of his clame quharfor he protestit for his costis and expens' and be ane suorne
assis' and the consaile

div.head: Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo Septimo
div.p:
Burgenses et fratres gilde burgi de Abirdene facti tempore prepositure
dominj Johannis rudirfurde de tarlane militis Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo
septimo

Johannes meldrum recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
preposito solito Juramento sed gracia prepositi et consilij secum dispensatus est de lott scott
waik and warde dummodo personalem residenciam infra eundem burgum fecerit

Willelmus bur per consilium recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde et commodum
inde preposito conceditur pro ij marcis Roberto huchosone exhibitis ante festum Sancti nicholaij
prestito solito Juramento et cetera

Patricius grige ad requestum Johannis Wormet Johannis grige et aliorum mercatorum
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde soluet xxti s' et prestito solito Juramento

Andreas andirsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Jura
mento et soluet xxxti s'

Thomas lask ad requestum et instanciam comitis de eroll recipitur in liberum burgensem pre et fratrem
gilde prestito solito Juramento
Johannes marschell recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluet ij marcis

Johannes Duncansone filius quondam patricij Duncanson recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Jure paternitatis prestito solito Juramento et soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes feche ad instanciam thesaurarij recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Wallace gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem qui sponsavit filiam
burgensis prestito solito Juramento

Jacobus Jofrasone in Kincarin recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paternitatis
soluet v s' in alba bursa et prestito solito Juramento

Johannes andirsone filius et heres quondam Johannis andirson' Jure paterno recipitur in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluet v s' in alba bursa

Jacobus burnat recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis et prestito
solito Juramento et cetera

thomas Watsone filius Johannis Watsone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde

Murdaicus blak recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
et soluet ij marcis

Malcomus crage recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluet
ij marcis

Andreas hatmakar recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde qui sponsavit filiam burgensis
prestito solito Juramento
Symon makeson recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde soluet xxti s' prestito solito Juramento

Dauid Adamsone Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
solito Juramento et soluet v s' in alba bursa

Alexander Willelmus angousone Junior ad Requestum diuersorum consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento

Willelmus Duncansone gemry recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam
nobilis dominj Alexandri domini de forbes prestito solito Juramento

Dauid strathachin' frater magistri thome strathachin Rectoris de tulynessile
ad instanciam dicti magistri recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento

Johannes Watsone gener olim Alexandri hay ad instanciam Comitis
de erole recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento

Andreas Cristesone ad instanciam domini de meldrum et patricij forbes
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluet xx s'

Willelmus blitht recipitur in liberum burgensem ad instanciam Willelmi cuming pro
suo seruicio presens eidem burgo facto

Willelmus mydiltone ad Instanciam prepositi recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito solito Juramento

Robertus andirson carnifex racione sue artis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento

Henricus lorne recipitur in liberum burgensem qui sponsauit filiam
burgensis soluet v s' in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Dys' filius Ranaldi Dys' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito solito Juramento et soluet xx s' ad instanciam dicti patris sui

Nobilis dominus Willelmus dominus de crichtone recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento sed secum dispensatus est de lot scott wak and
ward

Richardus lundoris Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito solito Juramento et soluet v s' in alba bursa

Gilbertus Kimpty Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
et soluet v s'

The xxij day of December the yer of gode jM iiijC auchty and sevin yeris
thomas prat pait to the aldirman the maile of tua sext partis of crovis
ane of alexander hais and ane vthir of Jhone of Kyntortis of the martymes
terme immediate gangande obefor this date or his entre to the said
fischingis

In the Court haldin be the ballieis the xxiii day of december the yer forsaid
James Colisone was maid quyt be the moutht of alexander red forspekar
of the assis' that the said James did his diligence that thome louson'
suld haue bene pait of j li' g' and that it was nocht in his defalt that
the said thomas wantit pament of the said j li' g'

the xxviij day of December the yer forsaide the aldirman alexander chamer Jhone
of Knollis alexander rede and Williame cuming ar chosin commissaris to this next
parleament for the towne ande to haue ane commissione vndir the common sele

the samyn day it was ordanit be the aldirman ande Consal present for the tyme
that Williame lutar sale haue his dietis in mett and drinke be the aldirman alde
consale and new circualy passande about

In the court of abirdene haldin be the ballieis the last day of december
the yer forsaide In presens of the aldirman and ballieis Syme of gardyne ande
Jhone fechat ar oblist and suorne the gret bodely aitht tile stande and abide at the
ordinance deliuerance and finale decret of thir personis vndir writin or the mast part
of thame that is to say Robert blinsel mastir Androw cadiow Jhone Wormet
thome prat Androu murray eldar and Walter auchnef arbitouris and amicable'
compositoris chosin and suorne be the said partiis anent the bying' and selling' of ane land
liande in the castalgate and anent the condicione maid betuix tham of the samyn and
anent al contrauersiis and debatis betuix the said partiis And the said arbitoris ar
suorne to giffurtht thar decret in the saide matir or the law day next to
cum
